channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- The Events Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- The Events Calendar

item.title: CVE-2023-6203|2024-08-02T08:21:17.837Z -- unknown -- the%20events%20calendar
item.description: The Events Calendar WordPress plugin before 6.2.8.1 discloses the content of password protected posts to unauthenticated users via a crafted request

item.title: CVE-2024-4180|2024-08-01T20:33:52.970Z -- unknown -- the%20events%20calendar
item.description: The Events Calendar WordPress plugin before 6.4.0.1 does not properly sanitize user-submitted content when rendering some views via AJAX.

item.description: The Events Calendar WordPress plugin before 6.4.0.1 does not properly sanitize user-submitted content when rendering some views via AJAX.
